mapper.sql: i.SAVE_FILE_NM as saveFileNm, c.CARTNUM as cartNum, p.BPRICE as bPrice, p.PNAME as pName, p.PNUM as pNum, p.DPRICE as dPrice, p.bprice - (p.bprice * p.discount) as afterPrice, c.CARTCNT as cartCnt, c.REGID as regId
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(o.oprice) as pay FROM cart c JOIN OPT o ON c.onum = o.onum AND c.regid = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT NVL(SUM(p.dprice),0) delivery FROM CART c JOIN OPT o ON c.onum = o.onum JOIN PRODUCT p ON p.pnum = o.pnum AND c.regid = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT NVL(SUM(o.oprice * (1+p.discount) * c.cartcnt),0) save FROM cart c JOIN OPT o ON c.onum = o.onum JOIN PRODUCT p ON p.pnum = o.pnum AND c.regid = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT
FROM CART c JOIN PRODUCT p ON c.pNum = p.pNum JOIN IMAGE i ON c.pNum = i.refNum WHERE c.regid = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT
FROM CART c JOIN PRODUCT p ON c.pNum = p.pNum JOIN IMAGE i ON c.pNum = i.refNum WHERE c.regId LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' ORDER BY p.pNum ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CART c, OPT o WHERE c.onum = o.onum AND c.regid = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CART WHERE regid = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
